name: ChatGPT
description: OpenAI's conversational AI assistant powered by GPT-4. Capable of answering questions, writing content, coding, and analysis.

pricing.details: Free tier with GPT-3.5, Plus at $20/mo for GPT-4

name: Claude
description: Anthropic's AI assistant known for long context windows, nuanced responses, and strong reasoning capabilities.

name: Google Gemini
description: Google's multimodal AI model integrated across Google products. Strong at reasoning and real-time information.

pricing.details: Free tier, Advanced at $19.99/mo with Google One

name: Perplexity AI
description: AI-powered search engine that provides cited answers to questions using real-time web data.

name: Mistral AI
description: European AI company offering high-performance open-weight models. Known for efficiency and strong reasoning.

name: Meta Llama
description: Meta's open-source large language model family. Available for self-hosting and customization.

pricing.details: Free open-source model, hosting costs apply

name: Jasper
description: AI writing assistant focused on marketing content. Offers templates and brand voice features.

name: Copy.ai
description: AI-powered copywriting tool with focus on marketing copy, social media, and sales content.

pricing.details: Free tier with limits, Pro at $36/mo

name: Writesonic
description: AI writing platform offering article generation, chatbots, and image creation in one platform.

name: Grammarly
description: AI-powered writing assistant that checks grammar, spelling, tone, and clarity across platforms.

name: QuillBot
description: AI paraphrasing tool that helps rewrite and improve text while maintaining meaning.

pricing.details: Free tier with limits, Premium at $9.95/mo

name: Midjourney
description: AI image generator known for artistic, high-quality outputs. Operates through Discord.

name: DALL-E 3
description: OpenAI's image generation model integrated into ChatGPT. Creates images from text descriptions.

pricing.details: Included in ChatGPT Plus, API at $0.04-0.08/image

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open-source image generation model that can run locally. Highly customizable with many fine-tuned variants.

pricing.details: Free to run locally, cloud options available

name: Leonardo.ai
description: AI image and video generation platform focused on game assets and creative content.

name: Ideogram
description: AI image generator excelling at text rendering and typography within images.

name: Flux
description: Latest open-source image model from Black Forest Labs, known for high quality and prompt adherence.

pricing.details: Free open model, commercial licenses available

name: Runway ML
description: AI creative suite offering video generation, image editing, and other creative AI tools.

name: Pika
description: AI video generation platform creating short videos from text or images.

name: Sora
description: OpenAI's text-to-video model capable of generating realistic videos up to one minute.

name: Cursor
description: AI-powered code editor built on VS Code. Features intelligent autocomplete and chat-based coding assistance.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI pair programmer that suggests code and entire functions in real-time within your IDE.

name: Replit
description: Online IDE with AI features including code generation, explanation, and pair programming.

name: v0 by Vercel
description: AI-powered UI generation tool that creates React components from text descriptions.

name: Codeium
description: Free AI code completion tool supporting 70+ languages and all major IDEs.

pricing.details: Free for individuals, Teams version available

name: Tabnine
description: AI code assistant offering private, secure code completions with on-premise options.

name: ElevenLabs
description: AI voice synthesis platform offering realistic text-to-speech and voice cloning.

name: Murf AI
description: AI voice generator for professional voiceovers with studio-quality output.

name: Suno
description: AI music generation platform that creates full songs from text prompts.

name: Udio
description: AI music creation tool generating high-quality songs with vocals and instrumentals.

name: Descript
description: AI-powered audio and video editor with transcription and text-based editing.

name: Notion AI
description: AI assistant built into Notion for writing, summarizing, and brainstorming within your workspace.

name: Otter.ai
description: AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes meetings in real-time.

name: Mem
description: AI-powered note-taking app that automatically organizes and surfaces relevant information.

name: Reclaim.ai
description: AI calendar assistant that automatically schedules tasks, habits, and meetings.

name: Canva
description: Design platform with AI features including Magic Design, background removal, and text-to-image.

name: Figma AI
description: AI features within Figma for generating UI designs, renaming layers, and automating tasks.

name: Framer
description: Website builder with AI features for generating layouts, copy, and components from prompts.

name: Remove.bg
description: AI-powered tool for automatic background removal from images in seconds.

name: PhotoRoom
description: AI photo editing app specializing in product photos and background editing for e-commerce.

name: Consensus
description: AI-powered academic search engine that finds and summarizes scientific research papers.

name: Elicit
description: AI research assistant that helps analyze research papers and extract key findings.

name: scite
description: AI platform that shows how papers have been cited - supporting, contrasting, or mentioning.

name: Semantic Scholar
description: Free AI-powered research tool for scientific literature with citation analysis.

name: Zapier
description: Automation platform connecting 6000+ apps with AI features for workflow automation.

name: Make (Integromat)
description: Visual automation platform for complex workflows with AI integrations.

name: n8n
description: Open-source workflow automation tool with AI capabilities and self-hosting option.

name: Bardeen
description: Browser automation tool using AI to create automations from natural language.

name: Clay
description: Data enrichment and outreach platform using AI to build targeted prospect lists.

name: Apollo.io
description: Sales intelligence platform with AI features for prospecting and engagement.

name: Gong
description: Revenue intelligence platform using AI to analyze sales conversations.

name: Lavender
description: AI email assistant that helps sales reps write better emails that get replies.

name: Synthesia
description: AI video generation platform creating professional videos with AI avatars.

name: HeyGen
description: AI video creation platform with talking avatars and video translation features.

name: Luma AI
description: AI platform for creating 3D models and videos from text or images using Dream Machine.

name: Chatbase
description: Platform for building custom AI chatbots trained on your data for websites.

name: Intercom Fin
description: AI customer service agent built into Intercom that resolves support queries automatically.

name: Tidio
description: Customer service platform with AI chatbot Lyro for automated support and live chat.

name: Julius AI
description: AI data analysis tool that lets you chat with your data to generate insights and visualizations.

name: Obviously AI
description: No-code AI platform for building predictive models and data analysis without coding.

name: Hex
description: Collaborative data platform with AI features for analysis, visualization, and sharing.

pricing.details: Free tier, Team at custom pricing
